languages.text: "Каторжане восстали против невыносимого поведения надзирателей. Пусть их перестанут мучить сверх меры".
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."
languages.original_text: "Каторжане восстали против невыносимого поведения надзирателей. Пусть их перестанут мучить сверх меры".

traits.locale_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their wardens. Have them stop torturing them beyond reason."
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their wardens. Have them stop torturing them beyond reason."
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their wardens. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their wardens. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."
"The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

languages.text: “那些守卫以令人发指的暴行折磨那些囚犯，他们已经无法忍受，开始反抗了。命令那些守卫，禁止他们继续无端折磨囚犯。”
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

traits.locale_text: “那些守卫以令人发指的暴行折磨那些囚犯，他们已经无法忍受，开始反抗了。命令那些守卫，禁止他们继续无端折磨囚犯。”

languages.text: «Los convictos se han rebelado contra las acciones intolerables de sus guardias. Ordéneles que dejen de torturar a los prisioneros más allá de lo razonable».
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

traits.locale_text: «Los convictos se han rebelado contra las acciones intolerables de sus guardias. Ordéneles que dejen de torturar a los prisioneros más allá de lo razonable».

languages.text: 「受刑者たちは看守の耐え難い行為に反旗を翻したんだ。囚人に対する理不尽な拷問をやめるよう命令せよ」
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

traits.locale_text: 「受刑者たちは看守の耐え難い行為に反旗を翻したんだ。囚人に対する理不尽な拷問をやめるよう命令せよ」
「受刑者たちは看守の耐え難い行為に反旗を翻したんだ。囚人に対する理不尽な拷問をやめるよう命令せよ」

languages.text: « Ainsi, les détenus se sont révoltés contre les actes iniques de leurs gardiens... Ordonnez à ces derniers d'arrêter de torturer les détenus sans raison. »
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi, les détenus se sont révoltés contre les actes iniques de leurs gardiens... Ordonnez à ces derniers d'arrêter de torturer les détenus sans raison. »

languages.text: "Die Sträflinge haben gegen das unerträgliche Vorgehen der Wachen revoltiert. Befehlt ihnen, die grundlose Folter der Gefangenen einzustellen."
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."

traits.locale_text: "Die Sträflinge haben gegen das unerträgliche Vorgehen der Wachen revoltiert. Befehlt ihnen, die grundlose Folter der Gefangenen einzustellen."
"Die Sträflinge haben gegen das unerträgliche Vorgehen der Wärter revoltiert. Befehlt ihnen, die gnadenlosen Folter der Gefangenen einzustellen."

languages.text: "Hükümlüler, muhafızların tahammül edilemez davranışları karşısında isyan çıkardı. Mahkûmlara akıl dışı işkenceler yapılmaması yönünde talimat verin."
languages.original_text: "The convicts have revolted against the unbearable actions of their guards. Order them to stop torturing the prisoners beyond reason."
